Plot: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.
Title: The Innkeepers
Actors: Sara Paxton, Pat Healy, Alison Bartlett, Jake Ryan
tomatoConsensus: It doesn't break any rules of the genre, but The Innkeepers serves as additional proof that Ti West is a young director that discriminating horror fans can trust.
